mapper.select: select round(used/total*100) pct, round(free) free, round(used) used, user_id, (select phonenumber from users where user_id = b.user_id)phonenumber from ( SELECT U.USER_ID, sum(df.bytes/1024/1024) total , sum(fs.bytes/1024/1024) free , sum(df.bytes/1024/1024) - sum(fs.bytes/1024/1024) used FROM dba_tablespaces d, user_tbspc_tb u, dba_data_files df, dba_free_space fs WHERE d.tablespace_name = u.tablespace_name AND d.tablespace_name = df.tablespace_name AND df.file_id = fs.file_id group by u.user_id )b where used/total*100 > 10
